tool_description: Generates detailed cutting lists with dimensions, quantities, and material specifications for all project components.

component_dimensions.description: List of component dimensions from dimension calculator

lumber_sizes.description: Available lumber dimensions in format like 1x4, 2x4, 4/4, 8/4

grain_direction.description: Preferred grain direction for each component

error_messages: Invalid component dimensions: Ensure dimensions are in proper format
Invalid lumber sizes: Use standard lumber dimension formats
Dimension mismatch: Component dimensions must match available lumber sizes
Insufficient lumber information: Provide adequate lumber size options
Grain direction mismatch: Grain directions must correspond to components if specified
usage: Input component dimensions, wood species, and available lumber sizes. Optionally specify grain directions. The tool outputs an organized cutting list.

cut_list_items.description: Complete list of cuts with dimensions and quantities

lumber_breakdown.description: How to break down each lumber piece
